title: Enhancing SAM with Efficient Prompting and Preference Optimization for Semi-supervised Medical Image Segmentation
details: A Konwer, Z Yang, E Bas, C Xiao, P Prasanna… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2025
abstract: Foundational models such as the Segment Anything Model (SAM) are gaining traction in medical imaging segmentation, supporting multiple downstream tasks. However, such models are supervised in nature, still relying on large annotated …
